SEARCH
Package com.project.sportsnewsbackend.service.LocalUser

Class LocalUserService

java.lang.Object
com.project.sportsnewsbackend.service.LocalUser.LocalUserService
@Service public class LocalUserService extends Object
Service class for managing LocalUser entities. This class provides methods to perform CRUD operations on users within the sports news platform, utilizing the LocalUserRepository for database interactions. Services offered include finding all users, finding a user by ID, saving a user, and deleting a user by ID. Additional business logic and user management functionalities can be added as needed.
